name: JONI-RANDOMZ & THE BOPPERZ
description:
Joni-Randomz live in his junkyard, a small junkyard filled with random things and full of noise, either its music or a machinery. "Cyber Beatz, Giga Botz!", as people like to answer when others ask "how is joni?". People all over the cryptic galaxy is asking a lot about him but little of 'em meet him, How is he so famous you might ask.

With The Bopperz-a join forces between his guitar and it's monstrous transmitter-He transmits his music by jury-rigging the audio media thru out the galaxy. even from his junkyard, he makes sure that everyone can listen to his music. he might not be the best guitar player, but everyone can hear him playing.
